DOC.brief_summary: Investigators carry study assess immediate long-term effect positive youth development program ( Teen Outreach Program ) high school youth Florida . This study answer follow question : What impact Teen Outreach Program sexual activity positive youth development end program 10 month program ?
DOC.brief_title: Multi-site Evaluation Evidence-based Positive Youth Development Program
DOC.detailed_description: Schools randomly allocate either intervention control group . At treatment ( intervention ) school , youth participate TOP addition Health , HOPE , Critical Thinking , Career Research , Leadership class . At control ( non-intervention ) school , youth simply participated business-as-usual Health , HOPE , Critical Thinking , Career Research , Leadership class . Two cohort student recruit study , first cohort join study August 2012 second cohort join study August 2013 . A survey give youth treatment control school . The paper-and-pencil survey take approximately 30 minute ask question youth school , grade , peer , health behavior , behavior relate teen pregnancy , include participant believe regard sexual health . The survey completely confidential participant name link survey response . All survey material pre-approved school administration school district office . Participants ask complete survey pre-intervention , post-intervention , 10-months post-intervention ( Cohort 1 )
DOC.criteria: Enrolled class select evaluation Had parental consent Proficient English Capable independently take paper pencil survey Not enrolled class randomly select evaluation They join participate class completion parental consent process Not sufficiently proficient English Could independently take paper pencil survey
